original_text: You are receiving the same kinds of trouble that I myself receive. You saw that when I was with you. Now you hear that it is still happening to me.
korean_text: 너희에게도 그와 같은 싸움이 있으니 너희가 내 안에서 본 바요 이제도 내 안에서 듣는 바니라

sentences.original_text: You are receiving the same kinds of trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 동일한 종류의 고난을 받고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that it is still happening to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 여전히 내게 일어나고 있다는 것을
